name: Archenemy (Demo)
description:
You will embark on an adventure playing as Sheila, a young exiled elf that excels at ranged combat. She is as swift as the wind: running, jumping and dodging like a green phantom. Her precision with the bow and her magical arrows are a deadly combination for any foe.

Exploring the forest you will come across mysterious locations, forgotten notes and combat chambers full of enemies, as well as an eerie doppelgänger of Sheila whose goals and agenda are unknown.

Sheila finds herself with no previous memories, sitting on an ancient rock with a mysterious circle and surrounded by a dense, unknown forest. Armed with her bow, she will face enemies, obstacles… even herself, to regain her memories and break free from the chains of fate.

The current version of Archenemy is a demonstration of the first playable level, born from the efforts and dreams of numerous people. If you have any feedback or want to contact us, email our team leader Marco Lomazzi at: marcolomazzi96@gmail.com

✦ The whole team thanks you for your time! ✦
